title: Cant play a game :(
body: I downloaded and tried the hextech repair tool. My laptop isnt hot and always has the built in fan on. Other moba games work on my laptop, but every time I enter the rift my laptop crashes. Someone please help me. Please don't put me in a longer low priority q because I would never leave my teammates behind on the field of justice. Feelsreallyfuckingbadman. Please help

replies.body:
Snap that does feelbadman. If your *entire* laptop is crashing and not just the game itself, there might be something going really wrong with some of the game files or your OS too. I'd try running the client repair first, and if that doesn't help try running the game after a clean boot to see if that let's you play without crashes. 

After trying those, if you're still crashing hit up our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some game logs for some deeper troubleshooting!
